name: Runner Dots
description:
This is my second game made with Unity, I made it as a programming practice for the course I'm taking, it's a mobile game so you can download it directly in google play store which I have linked below, it has ads implemented with google admob.

You can see the code here: GitHub

This game is based on a template, I replicated it only watching the template, te link to the original template: DotRun

Gameplay:
  • Your goal is to tap the dots of the current color indicated on the top of the screen. 
  • You have limited amount of time to tap the next dot with increasing difficulty.
  • Use the power-ups to get more points or to win a life.

In the future: If I have the time I'd like to add more power ups.

And thats all, have fun!
